name: geoip
description: Installs MaxMind GeoIP  binaries and databases
long_description:
DESCRIPTION
====

Installs GeoIP database and lookup executables.

REQUIREMENTS
====

Tested on Ubuntu.

USAGE
====

The default recipe will install the geoip lookup binaries and the GeoLite Country databases.

recipes.geoip: Installs the geoip lookup binaries and the GeoLite Country database.
